# Fentanyl Production
## Truly the most bizzare way of making [bold][color=yellow]money[/color][/bold] on the frontier.
[bold][color=#b4dae0]Fentanyl[/color][/bold] is from a series of chemical reactions that will eventually result in a [bold][color=#b4dae0]fentanyl crystal[/color][/bold]. This crystal is worth [bold][color=yellow]2000 spesos[/color][/bold], and is very [color=#ff0040]illegal[/color], being [color=#ff0040]C3 contraband[/color].
## Mixing
To make [bold][color=#b4dae0]fentanyl[/color][/bold], you will need [color=#63806e]space mirage[/color], [color=#FAFAFA]desoxyephedrine[/color] (commonly known as meth), [color=#b67823]oil[/color], [color=white]sodium hydroxide[/color], [color=#E7EA91]phenol[/color], and [color=#bf3d19]kelotane[/color]. -The recipes for all of these can be found in the [color=cyan]Chemicals[/color] section of Tables and References in this guidebook. -Once you have all your materials, you mix them. The recipe is [color=#63806e]1u space mirage[/color], 2u [color=#FAFAFA]desoxyephedrine[/color], 1u [color=#b67823]oil[/color], 0.5u [color=white]sodium hydroxide[/color], 0.5u [color=#E7EA91]phenol[/color], and 0.5u of the [color=#bf3d19]kelotane[/color]. -After you heat this mixture to 475k using a hotplate, you will get your [bold][color=#b4dae0]Fentanyl[/color][/bold].
## Solidification
Solidification is (relatively) simple compared to the synthesizing of it. You will need 1u of [color=#00e5ff]Tricordrazine[/color] as a [color=#00e5ff]catalyst[/color] for this. -To solidify your [bold][color=#b4dae0]fentanyl[/color][/bold], mix 7u of the [bold][color=#b4dae0]fentanyl[/color][/bold] with your [color=#00e5ff]catalyst[/color], and heat the mixture to 310k. -This will result in your solidified [bold][color=#b4dae0]fentanyl[/color][/bold].
## Hazards
[bold][color=#b4dae0]Fentanyl[/color][/bold] production is not without risk. While making the reagent itself, it will explode if heated to [color=red]480k[/color]. This is only 5k above the mixing temp, so be [color=yellow]very careful[/color]. -Additionally, during solidifcation, after the crystal is synthesized, you will have 7u of [color=#623cc9]Dylovene[/color] in place of your [bold][color=#b4dae0]fentanyl[/color][/bold]. [bold][color=#b4dae0]Fentanyl[/color][/bold] explodes if it comes into contact with the [color=#623cc9]Dylovene[/color], so you can only [bold]mix one crystal at a time[/bold], and must remove [color=#623cc9]Dylovene[/color] for every crystal synthesized.
